msg: PIG-2559: Embedded pig in python; invoking sys.exit(0) causes script failure

author: gstein
msg: Add option parsing, including rotating log files.
(prepare_logging): new helper function to prepare the Python logging
framework to write content to LOGFILE.
(handle_options): new function to handle all the command-line options
(main): take cmdline args rather than a config file. set up an
option parser and process the given args.
